Detailed Description

UHPI functional layer inline header file.

  • The defines inline function definitions

Path: \(CSLPATH)\ inc

static void UHPI_dspTOhostInterrupt_Clear ( CSL_UhpiHandle  hUhpi) [inline, static]

============================================================================
UHPI_dspTOhostInterrupt_Clear

Description
This API is used to clear the host interrupt

Arguments 

            hUhpi        Handle to the UHPI

Return Value None

Pre Condition
UHPI_open should be called successfully.

Post Condition
none

Modifies
none

============================================================================
